name: Admin Quicksearch
author: hakre

sections.description:
Quicksearch the Admin Menu and Plugin Tables. Zero-Configuration-Plugin, just activate and search boxes are available. Javascript Required.

Development of this Plugin is sponsored in part by Semiologic Pro.

Features

  • Searches instantly while you type.
  • Automatically opens matching main menus.
  • Search Term Highlighting
  • Searches Plugin-Tables.
  • Searches Semiologic Plugin Table in Version Checker.
  • Free

Document Scope

This file readme.txt has been created in the intention to provide data to be displayed on the wordpress.org plugin repository website. As always, for anything concrete and precise, refer to the plugin sourcecode itself, it ships with phpdoc style comments.
sections.installation: This Plugin can be used as a standard Plugin. Please refer to your products documentation how to install plugins or contact your site administrator. Javascript is required in your Browser.
sections.changelog:
0.2.2

  • WordPress 2.9 support

0.2.1

  • WordPress 3.1 support
  • Improved WordPress 3.0 support
  • Whitespace and Comment Fixes

0.2

  • Whitespace fixes.
  • Search box CSS background / border color fixes.

0.1

  • Repacked only.

0.1-alpha

  • Initial Release

-/-

  • Setting up SVN

Reduce the Plugin list while you type.
